user_query: offers to pay the guy that's going to kill him and he says nobody's paying me I'm paying them and you're like what the hell is going on with that what does he mean by that and then the third act as Paxton is involved in this club and he is trying to escape and he's slowly seeing all the different wings and all the different people all the different pieces that are involved with this little Murder Game and this torture game and then gets introduced to the dude from Suits how was it good goddamn fuck with this money it better be fucking all the pieces start to fall into place I think they do a good job with that you know the script writing as a whole is not necessarily a home run we'll get into that a little bit but as far as bringing this terrifying scenario to life and slowly revealing to the audience what is actually going on I think they paced it out really well and performance-wise I think all across the board it's pretty solid Jay Hernandez is somebody I've always seen do pretty good and he's he's good as the main character of Paxton he is somebody that you root for not only because this is a gross situation that looks just unbearably painful so you want him to get out just cuz you're human nature you care about other human beings but he does have enough personality to him and enough of a caring nature towards his friends that you endear yourself to him a little bit you got Josh who I've only seen in Dumb and Dumberer and this but he does especially a good job whenever

entities.entity_description: Paxton은 영화의 주인공으로, 살인 클럽에 연루되어 탈출을 시도하며 고문 게임의 실체를 점차 알아가는 인물이다
Jay Hernandez는 Paxton 역을 맡은 배우로, 전반적으로 좋은 연기를 보여주었다는 평가를 받았다
Dumb and Dumberer는 Josh 역 배우가 출연한 다른 영화이다
Suits는 영화에 등장하는 한 인물이 출연한 작품으로 언급된다

relationships.relationship_description: Paxton과 Josh는 친구 관계이며, Paxton은 친구들을 걱정하는 모습을 보인다

DUMB AND DUMBERER.description: DUMB AND DUMBERER -> DUMB AND DUMBERER
